properties.entry: SELECT FAQ_NO , FAQ_CATE , FAQ_TITLE FROM FAQ
SELECT FAQ_NO , FAQ_CATE , FAQ_TITLE FROM FAQ WHERE FAQ_CATE = '주문/결제'
SELECT FAQ_NO , FAQ_CATE , FAQ_TITLE FROM FAQ WHERE FAQ_CATE = '배송'
SELECT FAQ_NO , FAQ_CATE , FAQ_TITLE FROM FAQ WHERE FAQ_CATE = '취소/환불'
SELECT FAQ_NO , FAQ_CATE , FAQ_TITLE FROM FAQ WHERE FAQ_CATE = '반품/교환'
SELECT FAQ_NO , FAQ_CATE , FAQ_TITLE FROM FAQ WHERE FAQ_CATE = '기타/서비스'
SELECT FAQ_NO , FAQ_CATE , FAQ_TITLE , FAQ_ANSWER FROM FAQ WHERE FAQ_NO = ?
